# title

**Instance Property**

The title to display for the user’s location annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Accessing the user’s location annotation

- **subtitle**: The subtitle to display for the user’s location annotation.

items.description: The subtitle to display for the user’s location annotation.
items.name: subtitle

title: title
